info.brief_description: You shrink, and a girl who "just wants to help" accidentally makes your life hell.
info.description:
Long story short, you're a normal boy/guy leading a normal life until you suddenly and mysteriously shrink to around 3 or 4 inches. You're obviously horrified, and decide that you have to get someone's help as soon as possible. Unfortunately, you end up trying to get the attention of a girl that's not only a complete ditzy moron but is also the absolute clumsiest clutz. She's also pretty gross in at least one way or another (anywhere from always reeking of BO from working out all the time to having horrible gas to any other horrors you can think up ^_^), and is too oblivious to realize it.

So luck's not really on your side...

Even if she happens to notice you for what you are instead of a little doll or god knows what else, there's a pretty good chance her "help" is just going to make your life that much worse...

RULES

1. The main character (you) is 3 to 4 inches tall and is immortal AND invincible. YOU CAN NOT DIE and FEEL NO PAIN! I want this to be more of a humiliation story than an all out torture, so yes, you can be squished and such, but you're not going to sustain any damage from it. No other size changing and no death/gore.

2. No homosexual stuff/male interaction (besides you of course).

3. No underage interaction. So even with the mother chapters, keep the main character away from them. This doesn't mean they can't be in the story at all, but no direct interaction. For instance, your "caretaker" has to pick up her kids, and to keep them from finding you she has to hide you "someplace special". ^_^

4. No evil giantess, all the girls are either accidentally making your life miserable while being oblivious to you, or are trying to help but clumsily and/or stupidly end up just making it worse.

5. No Vore or Vagina action. (Soft mouthplay is fine, otherwise if you think you have a good idea for a chapter with these themes, PM me with the idea and we can talk. ^_^)

6. If you've read my other stories I'm sure you've noticed that I'd love it if there could be a bunch of butt/toilet related chapters in here!!!

7. No one or two line chapters unless absolutely necessary, should be at least a small paragraph.

8. If you follow the rules and add, awesome! If I really like your addition, I'll even chuck a bunch of Gift Points your way. If you DON'T follow/if you stretch the rules, your chapter MAY stay as it is, but I reserve the right to edit or in extreme cases delete any chapter. If your grammar is really bad, I may edit for this as well.

9. Have fun!!! (And if you like this and my other stories, PM me and maybe we could roleplay or story-swap sometime! ^_^)
